SEARCH
Package icyllis.arc3d.engine

Class SurfaceView

java.lang.Object
icyllis.arc3d.engine.SurfaceView
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public class SurfaceView extends Object implements AutoCloseable
Surface views contain additional metadata for pipeline operations on surfaces. This class is a tuple of SurfaceProxy, SurfaceOrigin and Swizzle.
